feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, impacted files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short functional summaries for each component or page.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint configuring cache-busting and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app with TanStack Router routes for lobby, chatroom, and admin pages plus layout and theming.

frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom card with media thumbnails, Twitch and Twitter preview loading, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media upload or URL options including Twitter embeds.

frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with navigation, avatar selection, and editable username.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder component that renders nothing because authentication is not used.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays chat messages with reactions, timestamps, media embeds, and reply/pin interactions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides text input, media upload, video/Twitter URL entry, and audio recording for sending messages.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synced state resets on URL changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Forces a fresh chatroom refetch when the actor becomes ready, purging stale or incorrect cache entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, and user utilities with search, categories, and local identity helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles including theme variables, layout rules, and voice message slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy and maps API responses to a simple GIF model.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to build lightweight tweet previews with caching and deduped requests.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching of tweet previews with validation, expiration, and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts IDs and generates thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs, with helpers to detect platform types.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page with password protection to list and delete chatrooms, using React Query for fetching and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Renders a chatroom page, fetching chatroom data, handling loading/error states, incrementing view count once, and displaying ChatArea when ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the lobby with chatroom lists, applying search/category filters, handling debounced search, recovery refetching, and navigation to chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container-query, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known lobby data-staleness issues, and feature requirements for fixing stale chatroom list behavior without altering recovery flow.
